front.title: Analysis and scenarios of multiple interfaces in a host

abstract.t: This document is an analysis of multiple interfaces in a host and description of scenarios of multiple interfaces with the respect of TCP/IP layer. The current TCP/IP mechanism and networking methods are suitable for a single network interface. When a host has multiple interfaces, the current TCP/IP mechanism and networking methods cannot directly be used for them. In this document, we describe some problems for a host which has multiple network interfaces as an aspect of host's operations and some usage scenarios of multiple interfaces in a host.
